thread.title: Protestors Chanting 'Shame!' Swarm Event With Aides To 3 Georgia GOPers (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Protestors Chanting 'Shame!' Swarm Event With Aides To 3 Georgia GOPers (VIDEO)

author: Kristin Salaky
title: Protestors Chanting 'Shame!' Swarm Event With Aides To 3 Georgia GOPers (VIDEO)
text:
Yet another town hall on behalf of GOP lawmakers was taken over Friday by protestors who demanded answers about the Republicans' plans to repeal and replace the Affordable Care Act and vented their anger at the Trump administration. 
Hundreds of protesters attended a “constituent service day” with aides to Sen. David Perdue (R-GA), Sen. Johnny Isakson (R-GA) and Rep. Jody Hice (R-GA), railing against the lawmakers and erupting into chants of "shame!", according to the Atlanta Journal-Constitution.
Read More →
